User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the Mounjaro de Pobre application.

currentWeight.description: The user's current weight in kilograms.

weightGoal.description: The user's desired weight goal in kilograms.

personalDream.description: The user's personal dream or motivation for weight loss.

onboarded.description: Whether the user has completed the onboarding process.

DailyProgress.title: DailyProgress
DailyProgress.description: Represents a user's daily progress in the Mounjaro de Pobre application.

date.description: The date for which the progress is recorded (YYYY-MM-DD).

ritual.description: The user's Ritual completion percentage for the day (0-100).

nutrition.description: The user's Nutrition completion percentage for the day (0-100).

movement.description: The user's Movement completion percentage for the day (0-100).

collections.description: Stores user profile data. Access is restricted to the user identified by {userId}.
Stores daily progress data for a specific user. The document ID is the date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
